comment: To all you moron Jew haters... You're as stupid, dangerous, and Godless as dimocrats. Your wanton unyielding ignorance shames all humanity. You are not welcome among decent educated people. I wish I could mute you all at once. My Lord Jesus IS a Jew. Stew on that. Eat it in fact. My staff will sprout while you grumble unto death. I truly feel sorry for you.
amr:
# ::snt To all you moron Jew haters... You're as stupid, dangerous, and Godless as dimocrats. Your wanton unyielding ignorance shames all humanity. You are not welcome among decent educated people. I wish I could mute you all at once. My Lord Jesus IS a Jew. Stew on that. Eat it in fact. My staff will sprout while you grumble unto death. I truly feel sorry for you.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (s2 / stupid
                        :domain (y / you
                              :mod (m2 / moron)
                              :ARG0-of (h / hate-01
                                    :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Jew")))))
                  :op2 (d / dangerous
                        :domain y)
                  :op3 (g / godless
                        :domain y)
                  :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 y
                        :ARG3 (e / equal)
                        :ARG4 (d2 / dimocrat)))
            :ARG2 y)
      :snt2 (s3 / shame-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii2 / ignorance
                  :ARG0-of (w / wield-01
                        :polarity -)
                  :mod (w2 / wanton)
                  :poss y)
            :ARG1 (h3 / humanity
                  :mod (a2 / all)))
      :snt3 (w3 / wish-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (m3 / mute-01
                        :ARG0 ii3
                        :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                        :time (a3 / at-once-02))))
      :snt4 r
      :name (n2 / name
            :op1 "Jew")
      :domain (p2 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Lord"
                  :op2 "Jesus")
            :poss ii3)
      :snt5 (s4 / stew-00
            :topic (t / that))
      :snt6 (e2 / eat-01
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (ii4 / it)
            :mod (ii5 / in-fact))
      :snt7 (f / feel-01
            :ARG0 (ii6 / i)
            :ARG1 (s5 / sorry-01
                  :ARG1 ii6
                  :ARG2 y3
                  :degree (t2 / truly))
            :ARG2 y3))

comment: Either ignore the user or remove references to people's mental capacities when making an argument.
amr:
# ::snt Either ignore the user or remove references to people's mental capacities when making an argument.
(o / or
      :op1 (ii / ignore-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (u / use-01)))
      :op2 (r / remove-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (r2 / reference-04
                  :ARG1 (c / capacity
                        :mod (m / mind)
                        :poss (p2 / person))))
      :time (a / argue-01
            :ARG0 y))

comment: Name calling the person you disagree with isn't going to solve anything.
amr:
# ::snt Name calling the person you disagree with isn't going to solve anything.
(s / solve-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG0 (n / name-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG2-of (d / disagree-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you))))
      :ARG1 (a / anything))

comment: Refrain from using language that uses derogatory language toward someones mental ability, regardless of who is right
amr:
# ::snt Refrain from using language that uses derogatory language toward someones mental ability, regardless of who is right
(r / refrain-01
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (l / language
                  :ARG0-of (u2 / use-01
                        :ARG1 (l2 / language
                              :mod (d / derogatory))
                        :ARG2 (c / capable-01
                              :ARG1 (s / someone)
                              :ARG2 (m / mind)))))
      :ARG1-of (r2 / regardless-91
            :ARG2 (r3 / right-06
                  :ARG1 (p / person))))
